references.paper_title: Shape, illumination, and reflectance from shading
references.reason: This paper introduces a learning-based approach for intrinsic image decomposition, focusing on a single image setting.

references.paper_title: NeRF: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This work introduces NeRF, which is foundational for various novel view synthesis and inverse rendering methods by representing scenes as neural radiance fields.
This work introduces DDPM, which serves as the basis for numerous diffusion models in generative tasks.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Diffusion, a highly influential text-to-image diffusion model, which serves as the architectural backbone of the current model.

references.paper_title: Shape, Light, and Material Decomposition from Images using Monte Carlo Rendering and Denoising
references.reason: This paper presents NVDiffRecMC, an optimization-based inverse rendering approach crucial for comparison and as a codebase for further experiments.
